title: This Dude Literally Nailed Himself in the Crotch by Accident and Here Are the Nasty Pictures
text:
Here’s what you need to know:
Sam Rees is a 22-year-old construction worker. He accidentally shot himself directly in the penis with a hydraulic nail gun while working on site in Swansea, Wales . The nail was three-and-a-half inches long. It could have severed his penis. It didn’t. He's fine. There are pictures of the nail in the penis. They were taken by his colleague, who told The Metro “For want of a better phrase, the nail was pretty much through his dick.” You will see them below. They are not cute. I warned you. I don’t want to hear it.
